overview:
Daniel Carpini is Marketing Director at xG Technology, Inc., where is he is responsible for developing and implementing marketing strategies and creating all corporate communications. He is also responsible for publishing and maintaining content for social media platforms including FaceBook, Twitter, YouTube and the corporate blog. Daniel is an experienced marketing professional with experience creating branding and marketing strategies in the telecommunications, informational technologies, health care, and financial services fields.

xG Technology is a developer of advanced cognitive radio solutions that enhance wireless and wired communications.
